title: 4 wounded, including pregnant woman, in Morgan Park shooting
content:
CHICAGO (WLS) --
Four people, including a pregnant woman, were wounded in a shooting in the Morgan Park neighborhood Saturday, according to the Chicago Fire Department.
The fire department received a call on the shooting in the 1400 block of W. 114th Place at 11:43 a.m.
Two men in their 20s were taken to Stroger Hospital with non-life threatening injuries, according to the fire department. Two women in their 20s were taken to Advocate Christ Hospital. One woman who is pregnant was taken in critical condition to Advocate Christ Hospital. The other woman was also taken to Advocate Christ Hospital with non-life threatening injures.
